nodes.text: Hhex was a Palandag musician who played f'nonc horn in a band alongside fellow Palandags Jhat and Dhuz. Around 34 ABY, the trio played in the Canto Casino in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. While playing at the casino, the musician wore brown, traditional yekermo outer robes over a brown robe with a golden trim. The Palandag had green skin and black eyes.

Hhex first appeared in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and identified in the accompanying reference book Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. Hhex and his band mates were designed by creature concept artist Tim Napper in a piece of concept art title "New Band 02".
